selected_skills.name: count_objects
selected_skills.purpose: To count the number of people born after 1945.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to count the number of birth years greater than 1945 from the list of birth years extracted from the image.

new_skill_specs.name: extract_birth_years
new_skill_specs.purpose: Extract birth years from an image containing names and birth years.
edge_cases: Image is blurry or birth years are obscured.
Birth years are not in a standard format.

new_skill_specs.name: compare_birth_years
new_skill_specs.purpose: Compare each birth year to a threshold and count how many are greater.
edge_cases: All birth years are below the threshold.
All birth years are above the threshold.
